snippet.title: PAYDAY 2: The Big Score Edition Trailer
snippet.description:
Console heisters rejoice! PAYDAY 2: The Big Score Edition is here and throws the PAYDAY gang into a new kind of crimespree ranging from going to Las Vegas to heist the Golden Grin Casino to stealing a fortune and jumping out of a flying plane! With PAYDAY 2: The Big Score Edition players get 10 paid DLC and 20 free updates - a host of new content including new heists, characters, weapons, masks and more. The update also includes many fixes and changes to the gameplay experience that makes PAYDAY 2: The Big Score the perfect addition to any console heisters arsenal.

http://www.overkillsoftware.com/payday2/console
